tool_description:
Wrapper for shopee api
generate a affiliate link for shopee
name: ShopeeApi
title: ShopeeApi

api_list.name: Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopeeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopeeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopeeapi1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopeeapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GenerateShopeeLink
api_list.description:
/generateShopeeLink?url=SHOPEEURLPRODUCT
Generates a affiliate link 

Headers
x-shopee-appId: YOURAPPID
x-shopee-secret: YOUR SECRET

get this in https://affiliate.shopee.com.br/open_api
